# Environment preparation aws

## Create EC2 Instance

* Go to EC2
* Create Instance
    
    * Ubuntu (22.04 LTS | 64-bit (x86))
    * t2.xlarge (free tier eligible)
    * select key(see below for creating a new key pair)
    * 30GB storage
    *

* Create a key (create new key pair)
    ![](images/img001.png)
    
## Connect to the Instance via ssh
    
    ```bash
        ssh -i
    ```
